title: Google Pixel XL (Gen 1) phone app not working?
content: About 3 weeks ago my phone went nuts. The phone will ring, but when answered the caller cannot hear me. If I call out, the callee cannot hear me. Sometimes I can hear whoever is on the other end, sometimes not. A factory reset has been suggested, but I'm concerned about "personal information, including SIMs will be deleted". What is SIMs info, and can I delete it? Google Pixel XL (first gen), Android 10.
